title: Exquisite Floral Diamond Haar With Emerald Center
materials: 4.25 Carats). Features a refined Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A captivating floral design meticulously crafted with brilliant cut diamonds. The Haar features delicate diamond-studded floral motifs intricately linked together. A single, vibrant emerald is nestled at the center, enhancing the necklace's regal appeal. The pearls drop from some flowers, adding movement and grace. This modern piece blends the brilliance of diamonds with traditional Indian necklace forms.
occasions: and upscale festive gatherings. Also suitable for contemporary celebrations and formal events.
description: This Haar seamlessly blends the classic elegance of South Indian jewelry with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and vivid emerald exude luxury and refinement. Its unique floral design ensures you'll make a statement, while the flawless Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty. A valuable heirloom to cherish for generations.
